00030 using namespace uvm;
00031 
00032 class uvm_ml_event_pool;
00033 
00034 class uvm_ml_event : public uvm_event {
00035 
00036   friend class uvm_ml_event_pool;
00037   friend class uvm_pool<uvm_ml_event>;
00038 
00039 public:
00040 
00041   static void initialize(bp_api_struct *bp_provided_api);
00042 
00043   virtual void notify(uvm_object* obj); 
00044   virtual void notify_without_bp_notification(uvm_object* obj);
00045 
00046   virtual void reset();
00047   virtual void reset_without_bp_notification();
00048 
00049   // Note:  sc_events() do not have hierarchy, so get_full_name() 
00050   //        does not make sense here - comment out for now...
00051   //virtual const std::string &get_full_name() const;
00052 
00053   static void notify_event_by_name(const char *                   scope_name,
00054                                    const char *                   event_name,
00055                                    uvm_ml_event_notify_action     action,
00056                                    unsigned int                   stream_size,
00057                                    uvm_ml_stream_t                stream,
00058                                    uvm_ml_time_unit               time_unit,
00059                                    double                         time_value);
00060 
00061  
00062   void notify_ml_event(uvm_ml_event_notify_action     action,
00063                        uvm_object *                   obj = NULL);
00064 
00065 protected:
00066   uvm_ml_event(const std::string &name="");
00067   void set_pool(uvm_ml_event_pool * pool);
00068 
00069 private:
00070 
00071   uvm_ml_event_pool * _pool;
00072 
00073   static bp_api_struct * _bp_provided_api;
00074 
00075 };
00076 
00077 class uvm_ml_event_pool : public uvm_event_pool {
00078 
00079 public:
00080 
00081   class uvm_object_creator_uvm_pool : public uvm_object_creator
00082   {
00083   public:
00084       uvm_object* create(const string& name)
00085       {
00086           uvm_object* _uvmsc_obj = new uvm_ml_event_pool(name);
00087           _uvmsc_obj->set_name(name);
00088           return _uvmsc_obj;
00089       }
00090   };
00091 
00092   uvm_ml_event_pool(const string &name) :
00093         uvm_event_pool(name)
00094   {
00095   }
00096 
00097   virtual string get_type_name() const { return "uvm_ml_event_pool"; }
00098 
00099 public:
00100   static void initialize();
00101 
00102   virtual uvm_event* get (const string& name);
00103   virtual bool remove (const string &name);
00104   virtual bool remove_without_bp_notification (const string &name);
00105 
00106 };
